onboarding.no_products_html: Choose a collection to be featured in this section. If none is chosen, all products will appear. You can disable this section by click Customize Theme and then 'Home page'.
onboarding.no_collections_html: You don't have any collections to show here. Add some collections to go along with the default Frontpage.

onboarding.single_collection_description: Once you choose a collection, its description will populate here automatically.
onboarding.single_collection_products_description: Once you choose a collection, its product descriptions will populate here automatically.
onboarding.no_content: This section doesn’t currently include any content. Add content to this section using the sidebar.
onboarding.no_page_content: This page doesn’t currently include any content.

slideshow.heading: Welcome to Palo Alto
slideshow.subheading: This subheading helps you provide some more detail to the title above.

faq.question: Question
faq.answer: Use this answer block to discuss some commonly asked questions you've discovered from your customers interactions. You could discuss product details, size fit, shipping policies, or anything you think would help merchants make an informed decision about your product or collection. This section will appear across all products.

blog.title: Blog post title
blog.excerpt: Once you create a blog post or choose a blog, its content will appear here.

icons_row.title: Feature
icons_row.text: Palo Alto is a powerful Shopify theme that will set you apart from the rest with a variety of sections and features.

testimonials.testimonial: Use this testimonial as an opportunity for your customers to discuss your brand and what sets you apart from the competition.

shop_the_look.heading: Our Story
shop_the_look.text: Use this text to share information about your brand with your customers. Describe a product, share announcements, or welcome customers to your store.

press.text: Provide some information about what the company below thinks about your brand.
